MS.S: Common functions used in DSC Resources
Copyright the DSC Community contributors. All rights reserved.

## [0.17.0] - 2024-01-23_x000A__x000A_### Added_x000A__x000A_- Tasks for automating documentation for the GitHub repository wiki ([issue #110](https://github.com/dsccommunity/DscResource.Common/issues/110))._x000A_- `Set-PSModulePath`_x000A_ - A new parameters set takes two parameters `FromTarget` and `ToTarget`_x000A_ that can copy from omne target to the other ([issue #102](https://github.com/dsccommunity/DscResource.Common/issues/102))._x000A_ - A new parameter `PassThru` that, if specified, returns the path that_x000A_ was set._x000A_- `New-Exception`_x000A_ - New command that creates and returns an `[System.Exception]`._x000A_- `New-ErrorRecord`_x000A_ - New command that creates and returns an `[System.Management.Automation.ErrorRecord]`_x000A_ ([issue #99](https://github.com/dsccommunity/DscResource.Common/issues/99))._x000A_- `New-ArgumentException`_x000A_ - Now takes a parameter `PassThru` that returns the error record that was_x000A_ created (and does not throw)._x000A_- `New-InvalidOperationException`_x000A_ - Now takes a parameter `PassThru` that returns the error record that was_x000A_ created (and does not throw) ([issue #98](https://github.com/dsccommunity/DscResource.Common/issues/98))._x000A_- `New-InvalidResultException`_x000A_ - Now takes a parameter `PassThru` that returns the error record that was_x000A_ created (and does not throw)._x000A_- `New-NotImplementedException`_x000A_ - Now takes a parameter `PassThru` that returns the error record that was_x000A_ created (and does not throw)._x000A_- `Compare-DscParameterState`_x000A_ - Add support for the type `[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary]`_x000A_ passed to parameters `CurrentValues` and `DesiredValues` ([issue #57](https://github.com/dsccommunity/DscResource.Common/issues/57))._x000A_ - Add support for `DesiredValues` (and `CurrentValues`) to pass a value,_x000A_ e.g a hashtable, that includes a property with the type `[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary]`_x000A_ or an array of `[System.Collections.Specialized.OrderedDictionary]` ([issue #57](https://github.com/dsccommunity/DscResource.Common/issues/57))._x000A__x000A_### Changed_x000A__x000A_- Updated the pipelines files for resolving dependencies._x000A_- Command documentation was moved from README to GitHub repository wiki._x000A_- Change the word cmdlet to command throughout in the documentation, code_x000A_ and localization strings._x000A_- A meta task now removes the built module from the session if it is imported._x000A_- Wiki source file HOME was modified to not link to README for help after_x000A_ command documentation now is in the wiki._x000A_- `Get-LocalizedData`_x000A_ - Refactored to simplify execution and debugging. The command previously_x000A_ used a steppable pipeline (proxies `Import-LocalizedData`), that was_x000A_ removed since it was not possible to use the command in a pipeline._x000A_ It just made it more complex and harder to debug. There are more_x000A_ debug messages added to hopefully simplify solving some hard to find_x000A_ edge cases bugs._x000A_- `New-ArgumentException`_x000A_ - Now has a command alias `New-InvalidArgumentException` and the command_x000A_ was renamed to match the exception name._x000A_ - Now uses the new command `New-ErrorRecord`._x000A_- `New-InvalidDataException`_x000A_ - The parameter `Message` has a parameter alias `ErrorMessage` to make_x000A_ the command have the same parameter names as the other `New-*Exception`_x000A_ commands._x000A_ - Now uses the new command `New-ErrorRecord`._x000A_- `New-InvalidOperationException`_x000A_ - Now uses the new command `New-ErrorRecord`._x000A_- `New-InvalidResultException`_x000A_ - Now uses the new command `New-ErrorRecord`._x000A_- `New-NotImplementedException`_x000A_ - Now uses the new command `New-ErrorRecord`._x000A_- `New-ObjectNotFoundException`_x000A_ - Now uses the new command `New-ErrorRecord`._x000A__x000A_### Fixed_x000A__x000A_- `Assert-BoundParameter`_x000A_ - Fixed example in documentation that were referencing an invalid command name._x000A_- `Get-LocalizedData`_x000A_ - One debug message was wrongly using a format operator ([issue #111](https://github.com/dsccommunity/DscResource.Common/issues/111)._x000A_- `New-ObjectNotFoundException`_x000A_ - Updated typo in comment-based help.

## [0.17.0] - 2024-01-23_x000A__x000A_### Added_x000A__x000A_- Tasks for automating documentation for the GitHub repository wiki ([issue #110](https://github.com/dsccommunity/DscResource.Common/issues/110))._x000A_- `Set-PSModulePath`_x000A_ - There are more_x000A_ debug messages added to hopefully simplify solving some hard to find_x000A_ edge cases bugs._x000A_- `New-ArgumentException`_x000A_ - Now has a command alias `New-InvalidArgumentException` and the command_x000A_ was renamed to match the exception name._x000A_ - Now uses the new command `New-ErrorRecord`._x000A_- `New-InvalidDataException`_x000A_ - The parameter `Message` has a parameter alias `ErrorMessage` to make_x000A_ the command have the same parameter names as the other `New-*Exception`_x000A_ commands._x000A_ - Now uses the new command `New-ErrorRecord`._x000A_- `New-InvalidOperationException`_x000A_ - Now uses the new command `New-ErrorRecord`._x000A_- `New-InvalidResultException`_x000A_ - Now uses the new command `New-ErrorRecord`._x000A_- `New-NotImplementedException`_x000A_ - Now uses the new command `New-ErrorRecord`._x000A_- `New-ObjectNotFoundException`_x000A_ - Now uses the new command `New-ErrorRecord`._x000A__x000A_### Fixed_x000A__x000A_- `Assert-BoundParameter`_x000A_ - Fixed example in documentation that were referencing an invalid command name._x000A_- `Get-LocalizedData`_x000A_ - One debug message was wrongly using a format operator ([issue #111](https://github.com/dsccommunity/DscResource.Common/issues/111)._x000A_- `New-ObjectNotFoundException`_x000A_ - Updated typo in comment-based help.
